net.tridentsdk.api.config

Class JsonConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.api.config.ConfigSection
      • net.tridentsdk.api.config.JsonConfig

  • public class JsonConfig
extends ConfigSection
    Represents the root ConfigSection of a Configuration file Controls all IO actions of the file

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonConfig(java.io.File file)
      Creates a new JSON configuration file using the file that may or may not exist
      JsonConfig(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Creates a new JSON configuration file from NIO path
